entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
